subject: Transgender and Transsexual
Basketball
Advertising and Marketing
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A. is launching a marketing campaign that makes it the first professional league to specifically recruit gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender fans.
snippet: The W.N.B.A. is launching a marketing campaign that makes it the first professional league to specifically recruit gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender fans.
